name: nlo racing
description:
This is a racing game.

The idea of a possible plot was as follows: An American pilot flew in to compete in space races on the track of the Russian part of space. And he must show his excellence on her.

By the way, this is neon  truters in ship.

It is a pity that this is only text in the description =)

Controls:

W - increase speed.

S - decrease but not less than 10.

Space - brakes which is increase controllability.

Thank you for playing. This is our first game in this garnerand this is was interesting to creating this game for gms2 jame =)
